summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of North Forty-third Street and East Forty-third Street, from Stone Avenue to Brooklyn Avenue; North Forty-fifth Street and East Forty-fifth Street, from Woodland Park Avenue to Fifteenth Avenue Northeast, and Interlake Avenue, from North Forty-second Street to North Fiftieth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wood crosswalks, in accordance with Resolution No. 525 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
